sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from JXDX_DSFCGQY JXDX_DSFCGQY where 1=1 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and QYRQ > $QSRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select QYRQ from JXDX_DSFCGQY where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select min(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg gx where 1=1 and gx.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH as ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_DSFCGQY JXDX_DSFCGQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY=JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DSFCGQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH as ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_DSFCGQY JXDX_DSFCGQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY=JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DSFCGQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%'
and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH as ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_DSFCGQY JXDX_DSFCGQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY=JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DSFCGQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH as ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_DSFCGQY JXDX_DSFCGQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY=JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DSFCGQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' and JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%'
and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_DSFCGQY.ZJZH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYRQ,JXDX_DSFCGQY.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY,DXGX_YJGX_DSFCG.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_DSFCG.JSRQ as JSRQ,KHDX_JG.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_DSFCG.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg inner join JXDX_DSFCGQY JXDX_DSFCGQY on 1=1 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY=dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG125 on KHDX_JG125.JGDH=JXDX_DSFCGQY.JGDH where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' order by dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.qsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY,DXGX_YJGX_DSFCG.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_DSFCG.JSRQ as JSRQ,KHDX_JG.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_DSFCG.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg inner join JXDX_DSFCGQY JXDX_DSFCGQY on 1=1 and JXDX_DSFCGQY.QYKEY=dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG125 on KHDX_JG125.JGDH=JXDX_DSFCGQY.JGDH where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' order by dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg.qsrq) a
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and qsrq=(select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg gx where 1=1 and gx.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and gx.jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg set jsrq=29991231 where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=(select max(jsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into XTB_HYGXJL_DSFCG(JLDH,GGBZ,KHDXDH,QSRQ,JSRQ,ZLBL) select $JLDH$,'$GGBZ$',gx.KHDXDH,gx.QSRQ,gx.JSRQ,gx.ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_dsfcg gx where 1=1 and gx.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=29991231
